about.title: We build solutions for everyday business activities
about.description: We are a group of tech-savvy individuals who run our own businesses in various industries. We are passionate about solving everyday problems with innovative solutions and automating as much as possible. By freeing up our time, we can focus on what we are most passionate about.
about.firstSectionText: We quickly realized that many business owners are so busy with day-to-day activities that they don't have time to keep up with the latest technologies, let alone integrate them into their operations. We are passionate about the rapid development of software, especially when it comes to artificial intelligence.
about.secondSectionText: That's why we decided to make our research public and create
about.thirdSectionText: Our goal is to simplify the process of integrating new technologies into your business and offer you our knowledge and experience. We've developed industry-specific tools that help you automate, digitalize and streamline your workflows.
about.fourthSectionText: Tobias Wupperfeld is the founder of DigitizerSpace. He is a seasoned software engineer with experience in various industries, including working at international corporations like SAP and innovative AI startups. Tobias has a passion for innovation and is dedicated to helping businesses of all sizes leverage the latest automation technologies and artificial intelligence to save time, cost and increase efficiency.
about.quote: I personally think that AI won't replace businesses but businesses that use AI will replace businesses that don't. Businesses powered by AI don't just lead, they dominate. Positioning oneself now before everyone else does is the key to success. Working smarter, not harder, is the essence of digital transformation.
about.fortune500LinkText: 80% of Fortune 500 companies use OpenAI products?
about.sixthSectionText: These companies have long understood the potential of AI and have been using it to their advantage. With the increasing demand for AI, it's only a matter of time until smaller businesses start adopting it too.
about.seventhSectionText: By partnering with DigitizerSpace, you can take advantage of the latest automation technologies and stay ahead of the competition. Check out our
about.eighthSectionText: to learn more about how we can help you achieve your business objectives.

paperless.title: Transform your physical documents into a searchable online archive
paperless.description: Paperless-ngx is an open-source community-developed document management software that runs on the server. You can connect your scanner to it or just drop files from your devices into the consumption of Paperless. The software automatically sorts and names your documents and makes them fully searchable thanks to OCR.
paperless.firstCheckedText: Find the right documents at a blazing speed and simplify collaborating with your team by digitalizing all your documents with Paperless.
paperless.secondCheckedText: Never worry about your files. Everything is backed up on your server.
paperless.thirdCheckedText: Forget about the repetitive task of manually naming and sorting documents. Automate from scan to document management and save a lot of time.
paperless.averageTimeTitle: Avergage time to find a document
paperless.teachDescription: No need for a classic folder structure
paperless.dataSafetyDescription: You decide what your team will see
paperless.reqTitle: What do I need to use Paperless-ngx?
paperless.reqDescription: Everything you need to setup the paperless-ngx system.
paperless.reqSecondStep: A scanner that is capable of sending files to a folder (e.g. Fujitsu ScanSnap).
paperless.reqThirdStep: A computer (ideally a server) where you want to store your files (e.g. Synology NAS).
paperless.installDescription: You can install Paperless-ngx on your computer, on your server or company infrastructure or on an external server. You need to make sure that Docker can run on your system. Docker is needed to create a containerized environment. It's a tool that helps people who write computer programs to make sure their programs work the same way on different devices.
paperless.installFirstStep: Install on your own server (NAS, company infrastructure).
paperless.installSecondStep: Install on external server infrastructure you rent (e.g. a VPS).
paperless.installThirdStep: Configure your scanner to drop files in Paperless-ngx.
paperless.installFourthStep: Configure access rights, login to the web portal and make a test run.
paperless.useDescription: We're currently working on a complete guide with a lot of tips, tricks and hacks to empower you to reap all the fruits of this system. In the meantime you can read the
paperless.useFirstStep: Our full guide is coming soon. Subscribe to our newsletter to get notified.
paperless.useSecondStep: More tips and tricks are published soon on our blog.
paperless.useThirdStep: In addition there will be curated articles on our blog soon.
paperless.offerSubtitle: We install and fully configure the Paperless system for you. Customized to your needs. Backed up securely.
paperless.offerDescription: Order today and start using the Paperless system within the next days! We install Paperless-ngx for you on a server of your choice.
paperless.offerFirstBenefit: Save time and effort. Professional installation and configuration customized to your use cases.
paperless.offerSecondBenefit: You can test Paperless-ngx here for free on our server (see below 'Test System').
paperless.offerThirdBenefit: You profit from our 30 day money back guarantee if you can't increase your efficiency.
paperless.offerFourthBenefit: Bonus: You get 90 days full support after your order and tips with using the software in an optimal way.
paperless.offerFifthBenefit: Bonus: We use the current cybersecurity standards and provide the best possible protection for your data.
paperless.offerSixthBenefit: Bonus: You get a 10% coupon for your next order which you can use on all our (future) tools and solutions.
paperless.pricingDescription: Easy one click payment with credit/debit card. After your order you will immediately receive our invoice in your email inbox. Within 24h we will start working on your inquiry.

item.firstName: Paperless-ngx installed on your company server or a virtual private server.
item.firstInfo: In case you don't have your own server choose between our servers in Germany or the US or 9 other locations (we partner with contabo).
item.secondInfo: We connect your scanner with Paperless-ngx so that your scans will directly be imported
item.thirdInfo: We setup a script to backup all your data in a place of your choice so that you can easily recover your documents in case of loss.
item.fourthInfo: We configure Paperless-ngx as you wish. This could include e.g. the integration of email accounts and the creation of additional users.
item.fifthInfo: We believe in our solution and return you the money no questions asked if you can't increase your efficiency after 30 days of using the system.
item.sixthName: Bonus: Connection of additional devices (smartphones) to your Paperless-ngx instance.
item.sixthInfo: We help you set up additional devices so that you can store scans in Paperless-ngx while on the move.
item.seventhName: Bonus: 3 month premium support & maintenance package.
item.seventhInfo: We help you set up your workflow and individual configurations.
item.eighthName: Bonus: 10% discount coupon for your next order on all our (future) tools and solutions.
item.eighthInfo: After the Digitizer-Space-Guarantee period is over we will send you a 10% coupon code which you can use to save on your next order.
item.ninethInfo: We will set up an encrypted connection for you and ensure that only persons authorized by you have access.
item.tenthName: Server costs depend on your storage requirements.
item.tenthInfo: Costs for a VPS starting at $4.50/month (200GB storage) and can be upgraded any time as you wish.

paperless.dataProtectionDescription: Our server solution is compliant with EU Regulation 2016/679 (General Data Protection Regulation, GDPR), the German Federal Data Protection Act (Bundesdatenschutzgesetz, BDSG), the data protection laws of the German Federal States as well as the German Telemedia Act (Telemediengesetz, TMG) and the German Telecommunications-Telemedia-Data-Protection Act (Telekommunikations-Telemedien-Datenschutz-Gesetz, TTDSG).
